verses.roman:
e-deha-darśana-sparśe kṛṣṇa-santoṣaṇa'
ei lāgi' kare dehera mārjana-bhūsaṇa

synonyms: e-deha—of this body; darśana—by sight; sparśe—and touch; kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; santoṣaṇa—the satisfaction; ei lāgi'-for this; kare—they do; dehera—of the body; mārjana—cleaning; bhūṣaṇa—decorating.
translation: "Kṛṣṇa finds joy in seeing and touching this body." It is for this reason that they cleanse and decorate their bodies.
